paper_title.ja: 解体木質材の地域リサイクルシミュレーションモデルの構築
paper_title.en: DEVELOPMENT OF SIMULATION MODEL FOR RECYCLE OF WOODEN RESOURCE GENERATED IN DECONSTRUCTING HOUSES

description.ja: A model for simulating the recycle process of wooden material produced by the deconstrucion of wooden houses has been developed, which is capable of describing the material flow of wooden resource based on logistic condition in a local area. The model, called recycle logistics model, consists of several agents which simulate wooden houses, deconstruction companies, intermediate process factories and recycle material production factories in the real world. They play their own role in computer program directed by political scenarios which control the material flow. An applied simulation for the recycle process in Yamaguchi Prefecture shows the useability and effectivness.
description.en: A model for simulating the recycle process of wooden material produced by the deconstrucion of wooden houses has been developed, which is capable of describing the material flow of wooden resource based on logistic condition in a local area. The model, called recycle logistics model, consists of several agents which simulate wooden houses, deconstruction companies, intermediate process factories and recycle material production factories in the real world. They play their own role in computer program directed by political scenarios which control the material flow. An applied simulation for the recycle process in Yamaguchi Prefecture shows the useability and effectivness.

paper_title.ja: 段階生成グリッド法を用いた室配置システムに関する研究
paper_title.en: A ROOM LAYOUT SYSTEM WITH HIERARCHICAL GRID GENERATION METHOD

description.ja: An efficient computer system to generate room layout patterns is developed. Five sophisticated methods are proposed in order to avoid 'difficulty of combination' and 'difficulty of evaluation' which are notable on room layout problems. 1. Hierarchical generation of layout patterns 2. Division of layout planes by grids 3. Form constraint for layout units 4. Position constraint for layout units by using communication frequencies between units 5. A concept of similarity between layout patterns A computer simulation based on stepwise moving was carried out for small houses. lt is concluded that the proposed methods and computer program are able to generate high quality layout patterns.
description.en: An efficient computer system to generate room layout patterns is developed. Five sophisticated methods are proposed in order to avoid 'difficulty of combination' and 'difficulty of evaluation' which are notable on room layout problems. 1. Hierarchical generation of layout patterns 2. Division of layout planes by grids 3. Form constraint for layout units 4. Position constraint for layout units by using communication frequencies between units 5. A concept of similarity between layout patterns A computer simulation based on stepwise moving was carried out for small houses. lt is concluded that the proposed methods and computer program are able to generate high quality layout patterns.
